column4: I need help getting Audacity to play with my microphone. Confirmed the mic is ok, and Audacity plays stuff, but I can't get it to record from my mic. I triple checked my Audacity and Volume appelet control/settings, still no joy, ideas?
what audio system are you using?
oos?
does your mic work with other stuff?
yes, confirmed it with my digi tape recorder.
what about sound recorder in the sound and video menu?
just tried that, no joy.
have you checked the volume settings?
I've triple checked the Audacity and audio applet settings, I haven't checked my bios, would my bios be involved? The sound card is onboard the mom board.
I've had a ton of trouble with that with quite a few apps, usually it is because the mic boost needs to be on and the the audio recording toggle needs to be on
Roger that. I've worked through this problem on other system before, with success, but now I've hit a brick wall.
maybe try changing sound systems, or wrapping the software in another one
I've had to do the wrapping for skype a few times
or was it vmware...
If I had a sound card laying around I'd try that. what's wrapping?
honestly I don't remember -- but there is a command you use to force a program to use a different audio system
here
I kept a record
sudo -i
Thanks, but I'm using oss. :)
cheers to that
